divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a light cloudy night just before 3am or rite at 3am a green orb fell at the rate of a free falling basketball but from the sky. Object was many miles away. I estimate the object was at least a half mile in diameter much larger than an asteroid or far off aircraft. This object was hidden by a thin layer of grey clouds but glowed thru the clouds there was no trail behind the falling object. This object was green in color uniformely round and had a lighter green ring around it much like a force field seen in science fiction movies. The clouds acted as a filter so I could not see the details in the green object but just the light and it appeared perfectly spherical with a fainter outter green ring like that of a shield. I was actually waiting for something to explode after it fell below the tree's on the horizon.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Irving
There were no other sightings in Irving on or around July 12th 2008
Summary: Green orb fell like a basketball from the sky appeared to be green.
